CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Participant__r.Birth_Month__c) && CONTAINS(TEXT(Study_Site__r.Participant_DOB_format__c), 'MM') , false , IF( ISBLANK(Participant__r.Birth_Day__c) && CONTAINS(TEXT(Study_Site__r.Participant_DOB_format__c), 'DD') , false , true ))
CustomField.label: Is Participant DOB Valid
